pageProduct.name: Pain Away Professional Pro-Salt X 45Mag Liquid Spray 100ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

For Muscle Performance, Endurance & Stamina needs

Warnings

For external use only. Please consult your health professional before using. If product gets into your eyes rinse thoroughly with clean lukewarm water. Avoid contact with eyes, open wounds & mucous membranes. If you have sensitive skin, test this product on a small area of skin before applying it to a large area. If irritation develops discontine use. Application to the skin may increase senstitivity to sunlight. Contains Ethanol.

Common Uses

Pain Away Professional Pro-Salt X 45Mag Liquid delivers a dose of magnesium through the skin for targeted absorption for your muscles performance, endurance & stamina needs.
Pain Away Professional Pro-Salt X 45Mag Liquid is an ultra high stength magnesium liquid formulation that has been developed and manufactured in Australia previously for the exclusive use and supply of professional elite athletes & national sporting teams in Australia & around the world.

Ingredients

Magnesium Chloride Hexahydrate. Also contains Lavender Oil, Cajeput Oil, Jojoba Oil, Eucalyptus Oil, Lemon Oil, Spearmint Oil.

Directions

Directions for use - Shake well before use. Most effective when liberally applied. Directly apply 5-7 Sprays on affected & most importantly surrounding areas (before, during and after everyday & sporting activities) as massage gently unitl fully absorbed, up to 2 times daily or when needed. Dilute if any stinging or irritation occurs. If symtptoms persist, talk to your health professional.
